columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ActiveCampaignSalesman record

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the related campaign

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Identifier of the salesman associated with the campaign

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date the record was created (format mm/dd/yyyy)

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique address identifier

columns.name: Line1
columns.description: Primary street address line (local language)

columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Secondary street address line (local language or unit info)

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Tertiary address line often containing city and postal code (local language)

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Country name (local language)

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate (numeric), provider-specific projection

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate (numeric), provider-specific projection

columns.name: GeoModelType
columns.description: Geocoding model type or classification code

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geocoding/model used to generate geodata

columns.name: GeoModelSearchDate
columns.description: Timestamp when geocoding lookup was performed

columns.name: GeoModelScore
columns.description: Geocoding confidence or match score (higher = better match)

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1ID
columns.description: Identifier for first matched street in geocode reference data

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2ID
columns.description: Identifier for second matched street in geocode reference data (if any)

columns.name: GeoModelLocID
columns.description: Identifier for the matched locality/place in geocode reference data

columns.name: GeoModelZip
columns.description: Postal/ZIP code as returned by geocoding model

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Foreign key to Country table identifying the country for this address

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Original query string used for geocoding (concatenated address)

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Text
columns.description: Street name text returned by the geocoding model (local language)

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Num
columns.description: Street number returned by geocoding model for street1

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Text
columns.description: Street name text returned by the geocoding model for a second street (local language)

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Num
columns.description: Street number returned by geocoding model for street2

columns.name: GeoModelLocText
columns.description: Locality/place name returned by the geocoding model (local language)

columns.name: GeoModelLongitude
columns.description: Longitude as returned by the geocoding model (text representation)

columns.name: GeoModelLatitude
columns.description: Latitude as returned by the geocoding model (text representation)

columns.name: GeoBroaderAreas
columns.description: Hierarchical or coded broader area identifiers returned by geocode system

columns.name: NumericZip
columns.description: Numeric postal/ZIP code (integer form)

columns.name: GeoModelDistrict
columns.description: District or prefecture name returned by the geocoding model (local language)

columns.name: GeoModelArea
columns.description: Smaller area or neighborhood returned by geocoding model (local language)

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data mapping key used to link to source/master data

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Source table name or dataset identifier for the address record

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data mapping / source linking

columns.name: GeoModelGC_Type
columns.description: Geocoding classification type indicator (single-character code)

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1
columns.description: Flag indicating if user manually overrode Line1

columns.name: Line1En
columns.description: Primary street address line in English (when available)

columns.name: Line2En
columns.description: Secondary street address line in English

columns.name: Line3En
columns.description: Tertiary address line (city/postal) in English

columns.name: Line4En
columns.description: Country name in English

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1TextEn
columns.description: Street name returned by geocoding model in English

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2TextEn
columns.description: Second street name returned by geocoding model in English

columns.name: GeoModelLocTextEn
columns.description: Locality/place name from geocode in English

columns.name: GeoModelDistrictEn
columns.description: District/prefecture name from geocode in English

columns.name: GeoModelAreaEn
columns.description: Area/neighborhood name from geocode in English

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1En
columns.description: Flag indicating if user manually overrode Line1En

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1NumEn
columns.description: Street number for matched street1 in English representation

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2NumEn
columns.description: Street number for matched street2 in English representation

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the advanced payment policy.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name or title of the advanced payment policy.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer description or explanatory text for the policy.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or account that created the policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or account that last modified the policy record.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Configured percentage value for the advanced payment calculation (if applicable).

columns.name: Plafon
columns.description: Monetary ceiling (plafond) for the advance amount. Currency hinted in source as USD.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: XML or serialized rule expression that defines conditional logic for the policy (stored as text).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the policy is currently active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: AdvanceAmountCalculator
columns.description: Optional script, expression or serialized calculator used to compute advance amounts (large text).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed monetary advance amount when policy uses an absolute amount instead of percentage. Currency hinted in source as USD.

columns.name: AdvancedPaymentMethodID
columns.description: Identifier of the advanced payment method. Part of composite primary key and a foreign key to dbo.AdvancedPaymentMethod.ID.

columns.name: SalesCollectionID
columns.description: Identifier of the sales collection. Part of composite primary key and a foreign key to dbo.SalesCollection.ID.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the discount policy.

columns.name: DiscountType
columns.description: Numeric code representing the category or type of discount (enumeration).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the discount policy (used as the primary display label).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer text describing the discount policy, purpose and any business notes (may contain localized/Greek text).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount policy is currently active and available for application.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the discount policy record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the discount policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent modification to the discount policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the discount policy record.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage amount of the discount to apply (e.g., 10.000 for 10%). Nullable when policy uses fixed amount or other rule.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed monetary amount for the discount. Values are stored with currency precision; currency hint on source is USD.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Text expression or rule used to evaluate when the discount applies (business rule or condition language).

columns.name: ApplyToUnit
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount should be applied to each unit (true) or to the transaction line/total (false).

columns.name: Bundle1Discount
columns.description: Configured discount (percentage or code) for bundle level 1; often null when not used.

columns.name: Bundle2Discount
columns.description: Configured discount for bundle level 2; often null when not used.

columns.name: Bundle3Discount
columns.description: Configured discount for bundle level 3; often null when not used.

columns.name: Bundle4Discount
columns.description: Configured discount for bundle level 4; often null when not used.

columns.name: BundleOtherDiscount
columns.description: Configured discount for other bundle cases not covered by specific bundle levels.

columns.name: MaxApplicableDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount (percentage or code) that can be applied by the pricing engine for this policy.

columns.name: MaxSupervisorDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that a supervisor-level user may approve under this policy.

columns.name: MaxAreaManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that an area manager may approve under this policy.

columns.name: MaxSalesManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that a sales manager may approve under this policy.

columns.name: MaxSalesmanDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that a salesperson may apply without escalation.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integration data model numeric key (reserved for external systems); often not populated.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Integration table name for external data model mapping; typically null in current dataset.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Integration character key for external mapping; typically null in current dataset.

columns.name: Product1Discount
columns.description: Configured discount for product slot 1 (nullable; used for product-specific discount overrides).

columns.name: Product2Discount
columns.description: Configured discount for product slot 2 (nullable; used for product-specific discount overrides).

columns.name: Product3Discount
columns.description: Configured discount for product slot 3 (nullable; used for product-specific discount overrides).

columns.name: Product4Discount
columns.description: Configured discount for product slot 4 (nullable; used for product-specific discount overrides).

columns.name: ProductOtherDiscount
columns.description: Configured discount for other product cases not covered by specific product slots.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the advertisement deactivation reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Readable description of why an advertisement was deactivated (localized text examples present).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key identifying the advertisement sales type (unique integer)

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable short code or description for the sales type (e.g., ST1, ST2)

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used to link into an external dimensional/data-mart table (often null)

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external dimensional/data-mart table that DMKey refers to (often null)

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for external dimensional/data-mart lookups (often null)

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the archived number record

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric code or value that was archived (human-friendly code for the archived item)

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the archived number record is active (true) or inactive (false)

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this archived number record was created

columns.name: CreateById
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the record; foreign key to dbo.User.ID

columns.name: CreateByUser
columns.description: Username of the user who created the record (login/account name)

columns.name: AttributeId
columns.description: Identifier for the attribute (logical attribute bucket). Represents the attribute group or type identifier used to group attribute values.

columns.name: AttributeType
columns.description: Numeric or coded value that classifies the attribute (e.g., type code for the attribute). Small set of distinct codes.

columns.name: AttributeName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the attribute (e.g., 'Internet_Cities'). This is the primary display label for the attribute group.

columns.name: AttributeLanguageId
columns.description: Language identifier for the AttributeName (locale code, e.g., 1032). Indicates the language/locale of the AttributeName.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier for a specific attribute value. Combined with AttributeId it uniquely identifies a value record.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: The textual value for the attribute (localized). Often contains the display string for the attribute value, possibly with metadata tags.

columns.name: AttributeValueLanguageId
columns.description: Language identifier for the AttributeValue (locale code). Indicates the language/locale of the attribute value text.

columns.name: ActiveUdacPartDefinitionCodes
columns.description: Comma-separated list of active UDAC part definition codes applicable to this attribute value. Often 'None' or a comma list of codes that indicate active part definitions.

columns.name: RuleConditionDefinitionID
columns.description: Identifier of the condition definition that can use the operand. Part of the composite primary key. Also serves as a foreign key to dbo.RuleConditionDefinition.ID.

columns.name: RuleConditionOperandID
columns.description: Identifier of the operand that is available for the given condition definition. Part of the composite primary key. Also serves as a foreign key to dbo.RuleConditionOperand.ID.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the bank (surrogate key).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Official/display name of the bank. May contain localized characters (e.g., Greek).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the bank is active and available for use (True = active, False = inactive).

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier for the star rating option (lookup id).

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable star rating label in English (for example: '1 star', '2 stars').

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Stable identifier for the attribute value. Represents the code for each star-rating option (stored as text, Greek collation). Distinct values seen: 13-17.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable label for the star rating attribute in Greek (e.g., '1 αστέρι', '2 αστέρια'). This is the primary display label for the attribute values and uses Greek_CI_AS collation.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction-type attribute value. Used to reference specific transaction types (examples include 109399-109401). Stored as NVARCHAR with Greek collation.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Readable description of the transaction type in Greek (for example 'Κάντε κράτηση', 'Κλείστε ραντεβού', 'Online Παραγγελία'). This field is the main display label for transaction type options and uses Greek_CI_AS collation.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the unit type value (string-coded). Appears to be an enumerated code representing an accommodation/unit type.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable name of the accommodation/unit type in English (e.g., 'Hotel', 'Hotel Boutique'). This is the primary descriptive label for the record.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the unit type value (string-coded). Matches the same identifier space as the English view and is used to join localized labels.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable name of the accommodation/unit type in Greek. This localized label corresponds to the English label in the EN view for the same AttributeValueId.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier code for the functional month value (English view). Distinct small set of codes representing months.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable month name in English (may include trailing separators). Primary display label for the month value.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier code for the functional month value (Greek view). Small set of distinct codes used to reference month names.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable month name in Greek (may include trailing separators). Primary display label for the month value in Greek.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Stable identifier for the payment method attribute value (English). Values are stored as text but represent the unique code for each payment option.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable payment method description in English (e.g., 'By credit card Visa'). May include trailing delimiters such as '||'.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Stable identifier for the payment method attribute value (Greek). Although stored as NVARCHAR, this column functions as the unique code for each payment option.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable payment method description in Greek (e.g., 'Με κατάθεση σε τραπεζικό λογαριασμό'). May include trailing delimiters such as '||'. Stored using Greek collation.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the room key option (system id).

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable description of how many keys are provided (English). Examples: '1 key', '2 keys'.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the room key option (system id).

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable description of how many keys are provided (Greek). Examples: '1 κλειδί', '2 κλειδιά'.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the arrival time value (lookup ID). Stored as text but used as the primary identifier for the time value.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Arrival time expressed in HH:MM format (English localization). Human-readable label for the arrival time lookup value.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the arrival time value (lookup ID). Stored as text and identifies the Greek-localized time entry.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Arrival time expressed in HH:MM format (Greek localization). Human-readable label for the arrival time lookup value.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the departure time attribute value (stored as text). Used to reference the time value in lookups and joins.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable departure time presented in HH:MM 24-hour format (e.g., '00:00', '13:30'). Primary display label for the time slot.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the departure time attribute value (stored as text). Serves as the lookup key for the Greek-language time value.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable departure time in HH:MM 24-hour format (e.g., '01:00', '05:00'). Primary display label for the Greek-language time slot.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the high-season attribute value (string-based id stored as NVARCHAR). Values correspond to attribute codes used in the application.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable English representation of the high-season attribute (e.g., month names). Note: values include a trailing delimiter '||' in the source data.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the high-season attribute value (string-based id stored as NVARCHAR with Greek collation). Matches the English attribute ids for localization mapping.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable Greek representation of the high-season attribute (month names in Greek). Values in the source include a trailing delimiter '||' and are stored with Greek_CI_AS collation.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the attribute value representing a low season month. Stored as text (numeric codes as strings) and used as the primary key for this view.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable English label for the low season month. Values may include trailing delimiters (e.g., 'January||') as captured in the source view.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the migration activity or step that created this attribute mapping. Distinct values indicate separate activities or steps.

columns.name: OldAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute in the legacy or source schema that is being mapped. Contains a small set of source attribute identifiers.

columns.name: NewAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute in the target or new schema to which the old attribute is mapped. Represents the mapped attribute in the destination model.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity or migration step with which this attribute value mapping is associated.

columns.name: OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the original (old) attribute value before migration or remapping.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the new attribute value that the old value maps to during migration.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity or migration step associated with this keyword mapping.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the keyword or tag that is being mapped to a new attribute value.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value that the keyword maps to as part of the migration or mapping process.

columns.name: SourceID
columns.description: Identifier of the original (source) record before merge; maps to a target record.

columns.name: TargetID
columns.description: Identifier of the target record to which the source record is merged.

columns.name: Initial_OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the original attribute value that should be replaced as part of a migration step.

columns.name: ReplaceWithAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value that should replace the initial (old) attribute value.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier for the original keyword that is subject to replacement.

columns.name: ReplaceWithKeywordID
columns.description: Identifier for the keyword that will replace the original keyword.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity associated with a given attribute value.

columns.name: AttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value linked to the activity (Step 1 migration mapping).

columns.name: Activity_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the business activity or industry code. Used to reference a specific activity record.

columns.name: NameGr
columns.description: Greek-language (localized) name/label for the business activity. Useful for Greek-speaking users and localization scenarios.

columns.name: NameEn
columns.description: English-language name/label for the business activity. This is the primary human-readable column for display and search.

attributes.name: GeoAreaId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the geographic area (e.g., S80125)

attributes.name: Name_ΟΝΟΜΑΣΤΙΚΗ
attributes.description: Onomastiki (official) name of the geographic area in Greek

attributes.name: Name_ΓΕΝΙΚΗ
attributes.description: Generic / common name of the area (often empty in sample)

attributes.name: specifiers
attributes.description: Additional qualifiers or specifiers for the area name

attributes.name: Concatenate Name
attributes.description: Concatenated display name for the area (preferred label)

attributes.name: CalendarDate
attributes.description: Calendar date (date portion of the datetime)

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Optional description (e.g., holiday or event) for the date in Greek

measures.name: PaymentCount
measures.description: Number of payment method records (rows) in this table

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of payment amounts recorded for the payment method

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average payment amount

measures.name: MinimumAmount
measures.description: Smallest payment amount recorded

measures.name: MaximumAmount
measures.description: Largest payment amount recorded

measures.name: DistinctSystemReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of distinct system receipt numbers associated with payments

measures.name: BankDepositCount
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN BankDepositNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of payments that have an associated bank deposit number

measures.name: PercentWithBankDeposit
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN BankDepositNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of payments that have a bank deposit recorded

measures.name: AverageDaysToBankDeposit
measures.description: Average time in days between collection date and bank deposit date (nulls excluded)

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of Amount recorded for the payment method (total paid).

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum Amount value in the set of payment records.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum Amount value in the set of payment records.

measures.name: TotalPolicyAmount
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount when present (policy-related amounts). Often null; included for completeness.

measures.name: PaymentCount
measures.description: Number of payment method records (rows) in this fact.

measures.name: DistinctPaymentMethodTypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct payment method types represented in the filtered set.

measures.name: AverageCreditCardInstallments
measures.description: Average number of installments for credit card payments (nulls ignored).

measures.name: PaymentsWithCheckCount
measures.description: Count of payments that include a non-null check number (indicates check-based payments).

measures.name: AdvertisementCount
measures.description: Number of advertisement records (rows)

measures.name: GrossPrice
measures.description: Sum of the listed Price for advertisements (gross before discounts)

measures.name: AveragePrice
measures.description: Average listed Price per advertisement

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Aggregate of all discount components applied to the advertisement (discount + rules + payment/product/bundle discounts)

measures.name: NetPrice
measures.description: Net price after subtracting known discount components from the Price

measures.name: OneTimeAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts associated with the advertisement

measures.name: ExtraFeeAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of additional fees associated with the advertisement

measures.name: ActualSpentBudgetSum
measures.description: Total actual budget spent for the advertisement (if tracked)

measures.name: AlteredAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of altered amounts (manual overrides) where present

measures.name: OneTimeAmountAfterDiscountSum
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts after discounts have been applied

measures.name: ExtraFeeAmountAfterDiscountSum
measures.description: Sum of extra fees after discounts have been applied

measures.name: ExtraFeeAmountAfterCCSum
measures.description: Sum of extra fees after cost-center / commission corrections (where tracked)

measures.name: AlteredPPCAmountAfterCCSum
measures.description: Sum of altered pay-per-click amounts after cost-center / commission corrections

measures.name: MonthsSum
measures.description: Total of the Months field (when used to indicate duration or billing months)

measures.name: ActiveAdvertisements
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AdvEndDate IS NULL AND (DeactivationDate IS NULL OR DeactivationDate > GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements currently active (no end date and not deactivated as of today)

measures.name: AverageDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days between advertisement start and end (only counts rows with both dates)

measures.name: ExtractCount
measures.description: Total number of extraction events (rows) in the table.

measures.name: UniqueMessages
measures.description: Number of distinct Text messages recorded. Useful to evaluate variety of messages logged during extracts.

measures.name: SuccessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of extracts marked with Status = 0. (Assumes Status = 0 represents success; verify with operational dictionary.)

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of extracts not marked as Status = 0 (possible failures or warnings).

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of extracts with Status = 0. Null when there are no extracts in the period. (Assumes Status = 0 = success.)

measures.name: Type_0_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of extracts where Type = 0. (Interpretation of numeric Type codes should be validated against a type/dimension table.)

measures.name: Type_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of extracts where Type = 1. (Interpretation of numeric Type codes should be validated against a type/dimension table.)

measures.name: Type_2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of extracts where Type = 2. (Interpretation of numeric Type codes should be validated against a type/dimension table.)

measures.name: LastExtractTime
measures.description: Timestamp of the most recent extraction event recorded in the fact table.

measures.name: AverageExtractsPerDay
measures.description: Average number of extract events per calendar day over the selected period.

display.notes: Type and Status are integer-coded fields. For clearer reporting, create small lookup/dimension tables for Type and Status (code -> label) and join them as default breakdowns.

measures.name: DepositRecordCount
measures.description: Number of deposit detail records (rows) in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctDepositNumbers
measures.description: Count of distinct BankDepositNumber values (unique deposit identifiers) in the current filter context.

measures.name: FirstDepositDate
measures.description: Earliest BankDepositDate (first deposit timestamp) in the current filter context.

measures.name: LastDepositDate
measures.description: Most recent BankDepositDate (latest deposit timestamp) in the current filter context.

measures.name: DaysBetweenFirstAndLastDeposit
measures.description: Number of days between the earliest and latest deposit dates for the current filter context. Useful to understand spread of deposits in the selected set.

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of batch action history records (rows).

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the history.

measures.name: TotalRowsAffected
measures.description: Sum of RowsAffected across all actions (total number of rows modified by recorded actions).

measures.name: AverageRowsAffected
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per action.

measures.name: MaxRowsAffected
measures.description: Maximum RowsAffected value observed for a single action.

measures.name: SuccessfulActionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions where Status = 1 (interpreted as success).

measures.name: FailedActionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions where Status = 0 (interpreted as failure or not-success).

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Proportion of actions that are successful (Status = 1).

measures.name: LastActionTimestamp
measures.description: Most recent TimeStamp for actions in the current filter context.
